__e: Maura, there was nothing you could have done On that bridge, okay?
Maura, I can't tell my mother that my brother's dead.
So, Jane and Maura still don't know - this party's for them, too?
There was a meeting ... me, Maura, Mom.
Only Maura and my family know, so...
What I love about you is that you took my mother in, and now I don't have to.
Maura took the flowers 'cause she said none of us knew anything about flowers.
Okay, the end of that sentence was not "Maura suffered a cut on the head."
Maura said that you can stay as long as you need to.
